name: Plasteroids (HADEX)
description:
My second entry for #SeaJam (https://itch.io/jam/seajam) I unfortunately had some commitments which made me unable to finish the game on time.

My First Entry: https://xd-hadex.itch.io/floppy-fish

Source code: https://github.com/HadyMash/Plasteroids

You are a turtle trying to get to land to lay it's three eggs (3 lives). However, the ocean is polluted and you must dodge the trash and destroy it using your bubble attack.

Controls

- A/Left arrow to turn left.

- D/Right arrow to turn right.

- W/Up arrow to accelerate

- Space bar to shoot

---

Attribution

Large trash pixel art: by Clint Bellanger (https://opengameart.org/content/recycle-items-set)
